place.name: HOLYMOORSIDE
place.gazetteerText: HOLYMOORSIDE, a village in Chesterfield parish, Derby; 3½ miles SW of Chesterfield. It has a post office under Chesterfield. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
